general.hero_heading: Launch a polished dropshipping storefront in minutes
general.hero_subtext: Use this starter theme as a clean foundation for your products, pages, and sections.
general.feature_one_copy: Adaptive navigation built for large catalogs, with mobile-friendly accordions.
general.feature_two_copy: Lightweight styles and scripts to keep your storefront fast and focused.
general.feature_three_copy: Add sections, templates, and snippets without wrestling with boilerplate.
general.404_body: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
